model

Class FunnoteModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.FunnoteModel

  • public class FunnoteModel
extends java.util.Observable
    This is the model of the application. The main method of the model is to create new pages, sections, and notebooks as well as save them to a directory on the user's device.
    Author:
    Scott LaFerriere, Trevor Freudig, Alexander Thompson, Michael Tuohy

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrGC

        public java.lang.String getCurrGC()
        This method returns the canvas of the current Page, Section, and Notebook
        Returns:
        URL of JavaFX canvas

      • createNotebook

        public void createNotebook(java.lang.String name,
                           java.io.File dir)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        This method creates a new notebook in the user inputed directory. It throws an IOException if the directory already exists. If not, it creates a new directory and Notebook
        Parameters:
        name- - name of Notebook
        dir- - directory of where to create new Notebook
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • createSection

        public void createSection(java.lang.String sectionName)
        This method creates a new Section and adds that section to the current Notebook
        Parameters:
        sectionName- - name of Section

      • createPage

        public void createPage(java.lang.String page)
                throws java.io.IOException
        This method creates a new Page in the current Section. It also numbers the page number accordingly based on how many current Pages there are.
        Parameters:
        page- - Name of Page
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • addCurrentPage

        public void addCurrentPage(java.lang.String page,
                           java.awt.image.RenderedImage image)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        This method takes a previously saved Page and redraws that canvas onto the current Page. It then adds the Page to the current Section
        Parameters:
        page- - name of saved Page
        image- - image of Canvas
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • hasSection

        public boolean hasSection()
        This method returns whether or not the current Notebook contains a Section
        Returns:
        true if Notebook contains a Section, false otherwise

      • hasNotebook

        public boolean hasNotebook()
        This method returns whether or not there is a Notebook currently generated
        Returns:
        true if there is a Notebook, false otherwise

      • hasPage

        public boolean hasPage()
        This method returns whether or not the current Notebook has a Section/Page
        Returns:
        true if Notebook contains a Page, false otherwise

      • getSectionList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSectionList()
        This method returns a list of all the Sections in the current Notebook. It uses an iterator to go through all of the sections in the current Notebook and returns a list of those Sections
        Returns:
        List of Strings of Section names

      • getPageList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPageList()
        This method returns a list of all the Pages in the current Section. It uses an iterator to go through all of the Pages in the current Section and returns a list of those Pages
        Returns:
        List of Strings of Page names

      • changePage

        public void changePage(java.lang.String page)
        This method changes the current Page
        Parameters:
        page- - Desired Page to switch to

      • changeSection

        public void changeSection(java.lang.String section)
        This method changes the current Section. It first determines if the Section is empty or not and then changes to said Section
        Parameters:
        section- - Desired Section to switch to

      • changeNotebook

        public void changeNotebook(java.io.File dir)
        This method changes the current Notebook. It uses a File and Object Input Stream to change the desired Notebook
        Parameters:
        dir- - directory of desired Notebook

      • getNotebook

        public Notebook getNotebook()
        This method returns the current Notebook

      • clearSavedTextBoxes

        public void clearSavedTextBoxes()
        This method clears all the saved Textboxes on the current Page

        This method adds a new TextboxNode to the page
        Parameters:
        node -

      • save

        public void save(java.awt.image.RenderedImage image)
          throws java.io.IOException
        This method saves a snapshot of the canvas to the current Notebook directory. Writes a FileOutputStream to the user defined directory
        Parameters:
        current - state of canvas
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getPageImageURL

        public java.lang.String getPageImageURL(java.lang.String imageNum)
        This method returns the path of the current Page
        Parameters:
        imageNum- - current Page
        Returns:
        path to current Page
